      • heapSize

        public long heapSize()
        Returns:
        Approximate 'exclusive deep size' of implementing object. Includes count of payload and hosting object sizings.

      • getRowArray

        public byte[] getRowArray()
        Description copied from interface: Cell
        Contiguous raw bytes that may start at any index in the containing array. Max length is Short.MAX_VALUE which is 32,767 bytes.
        Specified by:
        getRowArray in interface Cell
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        The array containing the row bytes.

        public short getRowLength()
        Specified by:
        getRowLength in interface Cell
        Overrides:
        getRowLength in class PrivateCellUtil.EmptyCell
        Returns:
        Number of row bytes. Must be < rowArray.length - offset.

      • getTimestamp

        public long getTimestamp()
        Returns:
        Long value representing time at which this cell was "Put" into the row. Typically represents the time of insertion, but can be any value from 0 to Long.MAX_VALUE.

      • getTypeByte

        public byte getTypeByte()
        Returns:
        The byte representation of the KeyValue.TYPE of this cell: one of Put, Delete, etc

      • getType

        public Cell.Type getType()
        Description copied from interface: Cell
        Returns the type of cell in a human readable format using Cell.Type. Note : This does not expose the internal types of Cells like KeyValue.Type.Maximum and KeyValue.Type.Minimum
        Returns:
        The data type this cell: one of Put, Delete, etc
